hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -v
GIT_EMAIL="huawei_ci_bot@163.com"
org=openlookeng repo=website
if [ -d "$repo" ]; then rm -rf $repo fi
replace() { local src=$1 local dest=$2
path=$dest/docs if [ ! -d "$path" ]; then echo "$path is not existing, going to create it." mkdir -p $path fi
menu=$dest/menu if [ ! -d "$menu" ]; then echo "$menu is not existing, going to create it." mkdir -p $menu fi
rm -r ${path}/* cp -r $src/* ${path}/
mf=${path}/index.md test -f $mf && mv $mf $menu
find $path -name "*_index.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\)\.\.\([^[]*\).png/\1.\2.png/g' find $path -name "*_index.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\.\.\)\([^[]*\)\/_index.md/\1\/docs\2.html/g' find $path -name "*_index.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\.\.\)\([^[]*\).md/\1\/docs\2.html/g'
find $path -name "*.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\.\.[^[]*\)\/_index.md/\1.html/g'
find $path -name "*.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\]([^:[]*\)\.md/\1.html/g' }
timestamp() { echo $(date +%s) }
submit_pr() { git config user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config user.name $GIT_USER
local branch=sync_doc_$(timestamp) git checkout -b $branch
git remote -v
git push -u origin $branch test $? -ne 0 && return 1
title="sync doc manually"
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' "https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/${org}/${repo}/pulls" -d "{\"access_token\":\"${GIT_PASSWORD}\",\"title\":\"${title}\",\"head\":\"${GIT_USER}:${branch}\",\"base\":\"master\"}" }
clone() { local path=$(pwd)
git clone https://${GIT_USER}:${GIT_PASSWORD}@gitee.com/${GIT_USER}/${repo}.git cd $repo
git remote add upstream https://gitee.com/${org}/${repo}.git git fetch upstream git rebase upstream/master
cd $path }
clear_env() { cd ..
if [ -d "website" ]; then rm -rf website fi
cd ..
if [ -d "hetu-core" ]; then rm -rf hetu-core fi }
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then clone
if [ -d "hetu-docs/en" ]; then
replace hetu-docs/en ./website/content/en-us/docs
echo "hetu-docs/en to en-us/docs copyed." fi
if [ -d "hetu-docs/zh" ]; then replace hetu-docs/zh ./website/content/zh-cn/docs
echo "hetu-docs/zh to zh-cn/docs copyed." fi
cd $repo
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker build -t web:v0.0.1 . if [ "$?" -ne "0" ]; then echo "build website error... the process will be exited." 1>&2 exit 1 fi docker rmi web:v0.0.1 else echo "docker is not installed, don't do build test." fi
git add content/* git commit -am "update product docs into website." test $? -eq 0 && submit_pr
echo "udpate the product docs finished. result=$?" else echo "git has not been installed." fi
#clear_env
